content.html: me: i am more than capable of getting work done with Netflix reruns on in the background boss: it’s distracting me: i’ve seen this show 863 times. it keeps me “in the zone” longer, especially during repetitive work boss: yeah. still no
content.value:
me: i am more than capable of getting work done with Netflix reruns on in the background

boss: it’s distracting

me: i’ve seen this show 863 times. it keeps me “in the zone” longer, especially during repetitive work

boss: yeah. still no
